project.name: ESC
project.description: The official ESC app provides news updates, photos and videos 365 days a year, and allows users to download their favourite songs of this year's contest. A highlight is the app's second-screen functionality, providing viewers with live updates during the shows about the contestants, their songs, opening- and interval acts, as well as the results. As soon as the lines open, users can vote right within the app.
project.what_we_did: Railslove developed the complete registration and payment workflow
